title: AI use in mammography more effective than standard: Results from Sweden's breast cancer programme
description: Use of artificial intelligence in Sweden’s national breast cancer screening programme has revealed that AI-supported mammography screening is more effective than standard mammography, according to full results from a 2023 trial published in The Lancet journal.
